name: JustKeepGrowing
description:
In Just Keep Growing, you play as a root system seeking water and nutrients on your quest for unending growth.

Controls:

RightClick to pivot/Look around

WASD to move

R to restart

Escape to Quick

Click on "pointers" and hold Q to direct root growth

Click on "nubs" to tell the root system to try creating a new branch at that spot!

Source: https://github.com/BenDawes/JustKeepGrowing
